name: gestureRecognizer(_:shouldRecognizeSimultaneouslyWith:)
desc: Asks the delegate if two gesture recognizers should be allowed to recognize their gestures simultaneously.
declaration:
optional func gestureRecognizer(_ gestureRecognizer: NSGestureRecognizer, 
shouldRecognizeSimultaneouslyWith otherGestureRecognizer: NSGestureRecognizer) -> Bool
